task.title: >How to Talk to Someone
task.shortdesc: In order to create a true connection with someone, you want to be able to talk to them and learn about that person. These instrutctions will teach to how to talk to a person respectfully and try to become their friend.

prereq.p: In order to complete this task, you will need:
prereq.div: Warning: If you fail, you will want to cut ties with the person

step.cmd: Make sure you already have a common connection with the person you are talking to, such as being in the same class
Introduce yourself by saying "hello" and say "My name is ___, what's yours?"
Move onto someone new if you are ignored as that's obviously someone you don't want to be friends with
Listen to your classmate if he speaks to you, he will say something along the lines of "hi, I'm ___, nice to meet you"
Find a relatble topic such as classwork and ask your classmate about it
Listen carefully to your classmate and constantly think about what to say next
Do not insult the classmate you are talking to or talk about more sensitive topics such as politics
Talk about surface level interests and ask them questions like where they are from to continue the conversation
